title: Sustainability Experience-Based Instructional Design for Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary mathematics education experience and basic understanding of sustainability concepts
context.additional_context: For current secondary mathematics teachers, strengthening competencies in developing and practicing pedagogical methods integrating sustainability and mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners can explain the connection between Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and mathematical concepts through simulation-based case studies
Learners can implement three or more mathematics lesson designs on sustainability using Design-Based Research (DBR)
Learners can evaluate a mathematics problem-solving module applying systems thinking and wise consumption concepts in a VR environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
